articles.content: On Friday, April 17, Fiona Apple released her stunning new album, Fetch The Bolt Cutters. Fans had been waiting eight years to hear new music from her, and it was well worth the wait. To celebrate the release, NPR Music had a live online listening party. We p… [+10812 chars]
